snippet: Ballads from Rascal Flatts, gospel music by Anita Wilson and folk-pop humor from Loudon Wainwright III.
abstract: Jon Caramanica reviews album Changed by Rascal Flatts; Ben Ratliff reviews album Worship Soul by Anita Wilson; Stephen Holden reviews album Older Than My Old Man Now by Loudon Wainwright III.

byline.original: By JON CARAMANICA, BEN RATLIFF and STEPHEN HOLDEN

lead_paragraph: Ballads from Rascal Flatts, gospel music by Anita Wilson and folk-pop humor from Loudon Wainwright III.

headline.seo: Albums by Rascal Flatts, Anita Wilson and Loudon Wainwright
headline.main: Albums by Rascal Flatts, Anita Wilson and Loudon Wainwright
